name: Skill Shoot Bottle 18
description:
Skill Shoot Bottle 18 is a game in which your task is to shoot at the bottles using a sniper rifle.
There are many amazing obstacles as the level progress.
Features:
1. Aim at the bottle, shoot bottles precisely
2. Move gun left-right with finger
3. Blast all within time
4. Shoot all in minimum time
5. Be accurate while shooting
